ui.dialogs.entity_registry.editor.switch: Ovaj prekidač će biti sakriven i novi {domain} će biti dodat. Vaša postojeća konfiguracija koja koristi prekidač će nastaviti da radi.

ui.dialogs.entity_registry.editor.hidden: Hidden entities will not be shown on your dashboard or included when indirectly referenced (ie via an area or device). Their history is still tracked and you can still interact with them with actions.

ui.dialogs.matter-add-device.main.answer: My device is brand new or factory reset.
My device is connected to another controller.
ui.dialogs.matter-add-device.new.note: You need to use the Home Assistant Companion app on your mobile phone to add Matter devices.
ui.dialogs.matter-add-device.new.downloa: Install it from the Google Play Store or the App Store if you don't have it.
ui.dialogs.matter-add-device.existing.qu: Which controller is it connected to?
ui.dialogs.matter-add-device.google_home: Find your device in Google Home. Tap the gear icon to open the device settings.
Tap {link_apps_services} and choose {home_assistant} from the list.
I can't find Home Assistant on the list
You are redirected to the Home Assistant app. Please follow the instructions.
Find your device in Google Home. Tap the gear icon to open the device settings.
Tap {link_apps_services} and choose {use_pairing_code} form the list
Paste the code you just received from the other controller.
Find your device in Apple Home and open {accessory_settings}.
Scroll all the way down and tap {turn_on_pairing_mode}.
You now see the setup code.
Paste the code you just received from the other controller.
ui.dialogs.matter-add-device.generic.cod: Potražite režim deljenja u aplikaciji vašeg kontrolera i aktivirajte ga. Dobićete kod za deljenje, unesite ga ispod.
